asset.author: charbroil
asset.hookText:
The Char-Broil TRU-Infrared Performance 3 Burner Gas Grill is perfectly sized to cook for a family of four.

Features:
- Three Burner Char-Broil TRU-Infrared cooking system
- 680 total square inches of cooking space
- 13,000 BTU side burner
- Appliance style cart with stainless steel doors for convenient accessory storage and tank access. 
- SureFire electronic ignition ensures a perfect start every time with an electronic spark at each burner 
- Precise cooking control with three grate-level temperature gauges
- Dual Fuel easily converts to natural gas

Visit http://www.charbroil.com for more information.
